Acknowledgments


Dandelion-DataTables is highly inspired by :

  • the excellent Display tag library which I used many years in different projects
  • obviously the terrific Allan Jardine's DataTables library
  • the previous projects : Datatables-taglib and DataTables4j

Dandelion-DataTables is tested using the great Java profiling tool YourKit.

YourKit is kindly supporting open source projects with its full-featured Java Profiler.
YourKit, LLC is the creator of innovative and intelligent tools for profiling Java and .NET applications.
Take a look at YourKit's leading software products: YourKit Java Profiler and YourKit .NET Profiler




Demo and documentation sites use large volumes of data generated by generatedata.
